Class ClientProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientProcess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientProcess
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is the main client's game thread. JCoincheClientHandler is giving message to it and it is sending thoses message to the MessageHandler It is a Thread btw :)
    See Also:
    JCoincheClientHandler, MessageHandler
